channel.title: [DELTA] Finding the attackplayer method
channel.description:
hey guys, im running a delta server and im having trouble finding the Player vs player method, i want to add a code in to prevent pk between the same IP.
can someone point me towards the right direction? Thanks.

item.title: [DELTA] Finding the attackplayer method
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“reventix, post:1, topic:453699”]hey guys, im running a delta server and im having trouble finding the Player vs player method, i want to add a code in to prevent pk between the same IP.

can someone point me towards the right direction? Thanks.[/quote]

In client.java search for the method: Attack

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Finding the attackplayer method
item.dc:creator: @Scriptzzz Scriptzzz
item.description:
@Scriptzzz wrote:

Almost every thing that your need in a delta is in client.java… that shit is way to easy to code. but fun
i miss my old delta days.
mind sending me a link to your server? in PM
